thread.title: Jaw Dropping View : - ( )
thread.title_full: Jaw Dropping View : - ( ) - Review of Mercure Paris Centre Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: luchito321
title: Jaw Dropping View : - ( )
text:
Just returned from France for our 4th yr wedding anniversary and had an amazing experience. While in Paris My wife and I decided to splurge and stay at the Mercure for a few nights. We stayed in a Junior sweet and it was well worth the price. Can't say enough great things about the attention to detail, cleanliness, and JAW DROPPING VIEW, spectacular.
Happy Travels,
Lucho
